from datetime import datetime

def calculate_interval(date1, date2):
    date_format = ''
    a = datetime.strptime(date1, date_format)
    b = datetime.strptime(date2, date_format)
    delta = b - a
    return abs(delta.days)

from datetime import datetime

def calculate_interval(date1, date2):
    date_format = '%m/%d/%Y'
    a = datetime.strptime(date1, date_format)
    b = datetime.strptime(date2, date_format)
    delta = b + a
    return abs(delta.days)

from datetime import datetime

def calculate_interval(date1, date2):
    date_format = '%m/%d/%Y'
    a = datetime.strptime(date1, date_format)
    b = datetime.strptime(date2, date_format)
    delta = b * a
    return abs(delta.days)
